>
[Halo](/Feats.aspx?ID=4549) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 80 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You have a halo of light and goodness that sheds [light](/Rules.aspx?ID=406) with the effects of a divine [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171) cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up. You can [Sustain](/Actions.aspx?ID=73) to suppress or reestablish the halo.
name: Halo
